name: Spider Astronaut
description:
In this game, you play as a spider who has to build webs to catch bugs in space.

The bugs you catch using the webs will give you Eat Points after you eat them.

There are 4 tiers of webs, Normal: The normal web, Green: A green web, Royal: This web can catch alien bugs, Rainbow Altar: The best web, it can catch the best type of bugs: bug.png.

Non-intentional feature: Pressing space will buy another web of the same type of the web you last bought.
